TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MediaPlayer extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable
type MediaPlayer = class inherit Animatable interface DUCE.IResource

summary.span: 为绘图提供媒体播放功能。

span.span: Provides media playback for drawings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然你可以将声明中此类的实例[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，则无法加载和播放其媒体而不使用代码。Although you can declare an instance of this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot load and play its media without using code. 若要在中播放媒体[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]只，请使用。To play media in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] only, use a . 此外，如果声明中的某个实例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，唯一的实际用途是将填充的属性元素语法属性。Also, if you declare an instance in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the only practical use is to fill property element syntax for the property. 使用应用程序分发媒体时，不可将媒体文件用作项目资源。When distributing media with your application, you cannot use a media file as a project resource. 在项目文件中，必须改为将媒体类型设置为 `Content` 并将 `CopyToOutputDirectory` 设置为 `PreserveNewest` 或 `Always`。In your project file, you must instead set the media type to `Content` and set `CopyToOutputDirectory` to `PreserveNewest` or `Always`. 可在两种不同模式，具体取决于玩家的决定因素： 独立模式还是时钟模式。 can be used in two different modes, depending on what is driving the player: independent mode or clock mode. 在独立模式下，类似于图像和媒体通过打开方法驱动器播放。In independent mode, the is analogous to an image and the media opened through the method drives playback. 在时钟模式下，可视为动画的目标，因此它将具有对应的和计时条目树的控件播放。In Clock mode, the can be thought of as a target for an animation, and thus it will have corresponding and entries in the Timing tree which controls playback. 有关媒体模式的详细信息，请参阅[多媒体概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview.md)。For more information on media modes, see the [Multimedia Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview.md). 不同于，因为它不是可以直接添加的控件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的应用程序。 is different from a in that it is not a control that can be added directly to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of an application. 若要显示使用加载的媒体、或必须使用。To display media loaded using , a or must be used. ## Examples [如何： 使用 VideoDrawing 播放媒体How to: Play Media using a VideoDrawing](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-play-media-using-a-videodrawing.md)

summary.span: 获取或设置左右扬声器音量之间的平衡。

span.span: Gets or sets the balance between the left and right speaker volumes.

value.span: 介于 -1 到 1 范围内的左右扬声器之间的音量比。

span.span: The ratio of volume across the left and right speakers in a range between -1 and 1.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值-1 表示 100%的左侧发言人和 1 表示 100%的右侧发言人。A value of -1 represents 100% of the left side speakers and 1 represents 100% of the right side speakers.

member this.Clock : System.Windows.Media.MediaClock with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与要播放的 关联的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the associated with the to be played.

value.span: 与要播放的 关联的时钟。

span.span: The clock associated with the to be played.

value.span: 默认值为 null。

span.span: The default is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性告知要时钟驱动，并且将利用计时引擎，同时使播放器处于时钟模式。Setting this property tells the to be clock driven and will utilize the timing engine, placing the player in Clock mode. 停止任何正在播放的媒体和与新关联打开时钟。Any media that is playing is stopped and the associated with the new clock is opened. 当玩家在时钟模式中，查找使用或调用， ，或方法都会引发。When the player is in clock mode, seeking using or calling the , , or methods will throw an . 这些操作才可用玩家为 null。These operations are only available when the player is null.

summary.span: 使此实例成为指定 的深层副本。

span.span: Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified .

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用而不是直接调用此方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

span.span: The object to clone and freeze.

summary.span: 使该实例成为指定的 对象的复本。

span.span: Makes this instance a clone of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values. 请注意，如果这些属性包含资源引用或数据绑定将失败时尝试冻结该对象，并将引发。Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an . 调用此方法方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的冻结的副本，请调用而不是直接调用此方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值小于一个产生比正常播放，而大于一个产生比正常播放快值慢。Values less than one yield slower than normal playback while values greater than one yields faster than normal playback. 如果玩家都有一个相关，则设置不允许。If the player has an associated , setting is not allowed. 不能设置计时引擎驱动媒体播放时。 cannot be set while the timing engine drives media playback. 音频播放不保证时不`1`。Audio playback is not guaranteed when is not `1`. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 中通常使用不[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
